Entries.default: "Halt! What is your business at the Brass Citadel?"
"I met Hazanui Karū at the palace."
"Just looking around."
"Stand down. I go where I want."
"Sorry, someone left the gate open."
"You're the Watcher. The one who nearly caused a riot in Queen's Berth." His mouth quirks in a grin.
"Her office at the back of Imperial Command. She is busy organizing... other matters." He clears his throat.
"Grand Secretary Atsura wants to meet you. His office is on the lower level of Imperial Command. Up the stairs." He points to the steps.
"Once you're inside, go downstairs through the room on the right."
"What about the hazanui?"
[Leave.]
"But I am sure she will grant you an audience."
"Hazanui Karū is the ultimate authority in the Brass Citadel." He crosses his arms over his chest in salute.
"Is he in charge around here?"
"But she must endure the sops at the palace." He rolls his eyes.
"When she returns, I am sure she will grant you an audience. For now, Atsura Nui speaks with her voice."
"Clear skies, friend." He crosses his arms over his chest in greeting.
[Cross your arms across your chest.] "Calm seas, trencher."
"You are the mysterious Watcher. The one who nearly caused a riot in Queen's Berth." His mouth quirks in a grin.
"Forgive my ignorance. I did not know you were from the rough country." He crosses his arms over his chest.
